thread.section_title: Bigboxcars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bigboxcars | bigboxcars.com.au
thread.title: Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text:
Just bought my 2016 Mitsubishi ASX from these guys. I've bought a lot of cars in my time and I have never had such a great buying experience. I drove down from Wooloowin thinking I was in for a typical painful and frustrating time. I was so wrong. Instead I was helped by a lovely young lady who didn't hassle me to buy things I didn't want, there was no intimidation from creepy salesmen and I got a great car at a great honest price.
Well done on creating a new world of secondhand car yards. I don't think I'll ever go elsewhere.
